servinfo.title: Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting

s1.ptxt: Remove transmission shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation:For Petrol Engine Model .
Detach engine harness clamps and ground wire harness from transmission front case.
Remove starting motor fastening bolts (2) and transmission fastening bolts (1).
Disconnect clutch fluid joint from pipe of clutch operating cylinder assembly referring to Clutch Operating Cylinder Assembly Removal and Installation .
Drain oil from transmission and transfer or extension case.
Remove propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Remove transmission fastening nut (2) and bolts (3).
Disconnect the following couplers and release their harness from clamps.
Apply transmission jack (1) and remove engine rear mounting member (2) taking off its bolts.
After removing mounting member, move rearward transmission and transfer or extension case assemblies placed on jack and then lower them.
Separate gear shift control lever rear case assembly (2) and transfer assembly (3) or extension case from transmission assembly (1).

item.ptxt: Slant the rear of the engine down, using support device (1) and install transmission to engine.
Use specified torques as given below.

torqueitem.t-part: Transmission to engine bolt and nut

item.ptxt: Set each clamp for wiring and hose securely.
Install shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation:For Petrol Engine Model .
Connect clutch fluid joint to pipe of clutch operating cylinder assembly referring to Clutch Operating Cylinder Assembly Removal and Installation .
Install exhaust No.2 pipe referring to Exhaust System Components:For Petrol Engine Model .
Fill gear oil to transmission referring to Manual Transmission Oil Change:For Petrol Engine Model .

Fill gear oil to transfer or extension case referring to Transfer Oil Change:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) , Transfer Oil Change:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator) or Extension Case Oil Change:For Petrol Engine Model .
Connect battery and check function of engine, clutch, transmission and transfer.
Install propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
